title: Restrap Tire Boot Kit offers a super light, permanent patch for cut tires
content:
We’ve all been there. Stranded on the side of the road with a cut tire, forced to improvise a tire boot with whatever is close at hand. Maybe that’s a dollar bill, or an empty Gu packet… really, just anything flat and durable enough to keep your tube inside the tire for the ride home.

The post Restrap Tire Boot Kit offers a super light, permanent patch for cut tires appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
